Description: Rim and body fragment of North Ionian meander rim pottery plate; hard-fired beige clay with little mica and some calcareous inclusions; slip on top. Rough maeander band on rim. Remains of band on underside adjacent to rim.
Curator's comments: Object owned and held by Musée du Louvre. This record is included in the British Museum database as part of the Museum’s Naukratis Project, a research collaboration that aims to virtually re-unite finds from the ancient port city of Naukratis, now distributed over 80 museums worldwide.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GG.695)
